text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medication-statement-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
recorded RecordedThe action of recording the medication statement is finished.
entered-in-error Entered in ErrorSome of the actions that are implied by the medication usage may have occurred. For example, the patient may have taken some of the medication. Clinical decision support systems should take this status into account.
draft DraftThe medication usage is draft or preliminary.

concept.definition: The action of recording the medication statement is finished.

Some of the actions that are implied by the medication usage may have occurred.  For example, the patient may have taken some of the medication.  Clinical decision support systems should take this status into account.
The medication usage is draft or preliminary.
